thread.title: Corinne

author: Corinne
title: Corinne
text: As many people are, I was skeptical. I looked all over the place for ways to sell my cards, and I found Card Kangaroo to be the only seemingly reliable one... And they definitely were. I sent my cards from Pennyslvania, and I got my money in about four days through PayPal. Thank you so much! Definitely will be using again. Please if you need money quick, use these guys, they are true to their word, and so am I. A+++
